meanings.definition: A mixture of various fruits or vegetables cut into small pieces.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a refreshing bowl of macedoines on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent2: The colorful macedoines added a burst of flavor to the meal.
meanings.sent3: The playful monkey tossed the macedoines in the air before eating them.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was like a vibrant canvas of macedoines, each piece unique and delightful.
meanings.sent5: The chef's secret to a delicious salad was the fresh macedoines he added.

meanings.definition: A type of dish made with diced ingredients, typically served as a salad or side dish.
meanings.sent1: The potluck featured a variety of macedoines, each with its own special twist.
meanings.sent2: She prepared a tasty macedoines dish for the family gathering.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to steal a bite of the macedoines when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: The macedoines at the party were a colorful mosaic of flavors and textures.
meanings.sent5: As she took a bite, the burst of flavors in the macedoines surprised her.
